Our democracy rests on those very values. So today I will #NeverForget but I also choose to affirm what makes this country so great.

18 years later we remember not only so we #NeverForget but also to remind ourselves of who we can be.   We can be a better nation one where we unite in the face of violence and never waver on our values of religious tolerance justice and equality.

I believe in this country. I saw the strength of America in the face of terror on 9/11 and in the duty of first responders.   I saw our strength in the everyday acts of people trying to reach a higher ground one with love and resolve. #NeverForget
